Much like the [[Heavenly Foot of Pain]], the user concentrates their chakra onto their foot, causing a purple clash of light when the user kicks the opponent with this technique. This does immense damage to the opponent, and the result of this technique is a very large crater into the ground.

[[es:Pie de Dios]]
